00025 /*
00026 The plugin interface is an integral part of UServer which provides a flexible way to add specific functionality to UServer.
00027 Plugins allow you to enhance the functionality of UServer without changing the core of the server. They can be loaded at
00028 startup time and can change virtually some aspect of the behaviour of the server.
00029 
00030 UServer has 5 hooks which are used in different states of the execution of the request:
00031 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00032 * Server-wide hooks:
00033 ````````````````````
00034 1) handlerConfig: called when the server finished to process its configuration
00035 2) handlerInit:   called when the server finished its init, and before start to run
00036 
00037 * Connection-wide hooks:
00038 ````````````````````````
00039 3) handlerRead:
00040 4) handlerRequest:
00041 5) handlerReset:
00042   called in `UClientImage_Base::handlerRead()`
00043 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 
00045 RETURNS:
00046   U_PLUGIN_HANDLER_GO_ON    if ok
00047   U_PLUGIN_HANDLER_FINISHED if the final output is prepared
00048   U_PLUGIN_HANDLER_AGAIN    if the request is empty (NONBLOCKING)
00049 
00050   U_PLUGIN_HANDLER_ERROR    on error
00051 */
00052 
00053 class UIptAccount;
00054 class UNoCatPlugIn;
00055 
00056 class UModNoCatPeer : public UIPAddress, UEventTime {
00057 public:
00058 
00059         // Allocator e Deallocator
00060         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00061         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00062 
00063         enum Status { PEER_DENY, PEER_ACCEPT };
00064 
00065         // COSTRUTTORI
00066 
00067                                 UModNoCatPeer(const UString& peer_ip);
00068         virtual ~UModNoCatPeer()
00069                 {
00070                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UModNoCatPeer)
00071                 }
00072 
00073         // VARIE
00074 
00075         void setCommand(const UString& access_cmd)
00076                 {
00077                 U_TRACE(0, "UModNoCatPeer::setCommand(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(access_cmd))
00078 
00079                 // NB: AUTOMATIC PARAMS(5) ADDED BY THIS PLUGIN: [action(permit|deny) mac ip class(Owner|Member|Public) rulenum]
00080 
00081                 command.snprintf("%.*s (permit|deny) %.*s %.*s Member %u", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(access_cmd), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(mac), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(ip), rulenum);
00082 
00083                 cmd.set(command, (char**)0);
00084                 }
00085 
00086         // define method VIRTUAL of class UEventTime
00087 
00088         virtual int handlerTime();
00089 
00090         // DEBUG
00091 
00092 #ifdef DEBUG
00093         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00094 #endif
00095 
00096 protected:
00097         int status;
00098         time_t connected, expire, logout, ctime;
00099         uint32_t ifindex, traffic, ctraffic, ltraffic, rulenum, index_AUTH;
00100         UString ip, mac, token, command, user, ifname;
00101         UCommand cmd;
00102 
00103 private:
00104         UModNoCatPeer(const UModNoCatPeer&) : UIPAddress(), UEventTime() {}
00105         UModNoCatPeer& operator=(const UModNoCatPeer&)                   { return *this; }
00106 
00107         friend class UNoCatPlugIn;
00108 };
00109 
00110 // override the default...
00111 template <> inline void u_destroy(UIPAddress** ptr, uint32_t n) { U_TRACE(0,"u_destroy<UIPAddress*>(%p,%u)", ptr, n) }

00206         static bool isPingAsyncPending()
00207                 {
00208                 U_TRACE(0, "UNoCatPlugIn::isPingAsyncPending()")
00209 
00210                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("nfds = %u addrmask = %p", nfds, addrmask)
00211 
00212                 bool result = (nfds && addrmask == 0);
00213 
00214                 U_RETURN(result);
00215                 }
